text:
Deploying(copying webapp.war) and restarting tomcat doenst always deploy webapp.

I have few tomcat servers, and I deploy a webapp.war file.
This I do by copying the war file to the tomcat (stopped), and earlier webapp 
removed.

I do a restart, which would install the webapp. 
Now after waiting for 30 secs, I delete the webapp.war file.

There are times when the webapp doesnt exist.
creator: aruneesh.salhotra@miletustrading.com
